content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Describe Lenin’s purpose in writing the text. b) Explain how Lenin’s rhetoric provides information about Russia’s situation in 1917. c) Describe the ideology that was the primary influence on Lenin’s writing.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
